      • Ride

        public Ride(int seed,
            java.lang.String name,
            int minRank,
            int maxRank,
            int space,
            int length,
            int rideMaxCapacity,
            int queueCapacity,
            int injuryRate)
        Constructor for objects of class Ride
        Parameters:
        seed - - seed for the random generator
        name - - contains the name of the ride
        minRnak - - contains the maximum rank of the rid
        space - - the cost of the ride
        length - - the steps it takes to complete a ride
        rideMaxCapacity - - the maximum amout of people contained in the ride
        queueCapacity - - the maximum number of people in the queue of the ride
        injuryRate - - the percentage of being injured when riding the ride
